param.name: general_template
param.label: Template
param.description: Select template to be used for all of CB GroupJive. If template is incomplete then missing files will be used from the default template. Template files can be located at the following location: components/com_comprofiler/plugin/user/plug_cbgroupjive/templates/.

param.name: general_class
param.label: Class
param.description: Optionally add a class suffix to surrounding DIV encasing all of CB GroupJive.

param.name: general_delete
param.label: Auto Delete
param.description: Enable or disable automatic deletion of groups when a user is deleted.

param.name: general_menu
param.label: Admin Menu
param.description: Enable or disable usage of backend administrator menu.

param.name: canvas_resample
param.label: Always Resample
param.description: Choose if images uploaded should always be resampled. Resampling adds additional security, but animations will only be kept when using ImageMagick.

param.name: canvas_image_height
param.label: Maximum Image Height
param.description: Input the maximum height in pixels that the image will be resized to.

param.name: canvas_image_width
param.label: Maximum Image Width
param.description: Input the maximum width in pixels that the image will be resized to.

param.name: canvas_thumbnail_height
param.label: Maximum Thumbnail Height
param.description: Input the maximum thumbnail height in pixels that the image will be resized to.

param.name: canvas_thumbnail_width
param.label: Maximum Thumbnail Width
param.description: Input the maximum thumbnail width in pixels that the image will be resized to.

param.name: canvas_maintain_aspect_ratio
param.label: Maintain Aspect Ratio
param.description: Choose if images uploaded should maintain their aspect ratio when resizing. If set to No the image will always be resized to the specified maximum width and height. If set to Yes the aspect ratio will be maintained as much as possible within the maximum width and height. If set to Yes with Cropping the image will always resize to the specified maximum width and height within the aspect ratio and crop any overflow; this is useful for maintain squared images.

param.name: canvas_min_size
param.label: Minimum File Size
param.description: Input the minimum image file size in KBs.

param.name: canvas_max_size
param.label: Maximum File Size
param.description: Input the maximum image file size in KBs. Set to 0 for no limit.

param.name: categories_canvas
param.label: Category Canvas
param.description: Choose the default category canvas image. Additional defaults can be uploaded to the images folder of your CB GroupJive template (e.g. /components/com_comprofiler/plugin/user/plug_cbgroupjive/templates/default/images).

param.name: categories_logo
param.label: Category Logo
param.description: Choose the default category logo image. Additional defaults can be uploaded to the images folder of your CB GroupJive template (e.g. /components/com_comprofiler/plugin/user/plug_cbgroupjive/templates/default/images).

param.name: groups_canvas
param.label: Group Canvas
param.description: Choose the default group canvas image. Additional defaults can be uploaded to the images folder of your CB GroupJive template (e.g. /components/com_comprofiler/plugin/user/plug_cbgroupjive/templates/default/images).

param.name: groups_logo
param.label: Group Logo
param.description: Choose the default group logo image. Additional defaults can be uploaded to the images folder of your CB GroupJive template (e.g. /components/com_comprofiler/plugin/user/plug_cbgroupjive/templates/default/images).

param.name: notifications
param.label: Notifications
param.description: Enable or disable sending and configuration of notifications. This will not disable some core notifications such as group join approval, group create approval, invites, and more.

param.name: notifications_notifyby
param.label: Notify By
param.description: Select how notifications should be sent.

param.name: notifications_from_name
param.label: From Name
param.description: Optionally input the email from name. This will override the system from name.

param.name: notifications_from_address
param.label: From Email Address
param.description: Optionally input the email from address. This will override the system email address.

param.name: groups_create_access
param.label: Create Access
param.description: Select group create access. Access determines who can create groups. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: groups_create_limit
param.label: Create Limit
param.description: Input number of groups each individual user is limited to creating. If blank allow unlimited groups. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: groups_create_approval
param.label: Approval
param.description: Enable or disable approval of new groups. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: groups_create_captcha
param.label: Captcha
param.description: Enable or disable usage of captcha on groups. Requires latest CB AntiSpam to be installed and published. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: groups_create_approval_notify
param.label: Notify
param.description: Enable or disable moderator notifications for groups needing approval.

param.name: groups_delete
param.label: Auto Delete
param.description: Enable or disable automatic deletion of group contents when a group user is deleted.

param.name: groups_message
param.label: Display
param.description: Enable or disable usage of group message. Group message allows the group owner and group administrators to send a notification to all active group users. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: groups_message_type
param.label: Type
param.description: Select how group messages should be sent.

param.name: groups_message_subject
param.label: Subject
param.description: Enable or disable usage of group message subject. This allows customizing the message subject. Note this only works with email message type.

param.name: groups_message_html
param.label: HTML
param.description: Enable or disable support for HTML in group messages.

param.name: groups_message_delay
param.label: Delay
param.description: Input the number of seconds between group messages. Leave empty for no delay. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: groups_message_captcha
param.label: Captcha
param.description: Enable or disable usage of captcha on group message. Requires latest CB AntiSpam to be installed and published. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: groups_users_owner
param.label: Display Owner
param.description: Enable or disable display of group owner. Note owner will not count towards total users if not displayed.

param.name: groups_users_paging

param.name: groups_users_search

param.name: groups_invites_display
param.label: Display
param.description: Enable or disable usage of group invites. Invite group types are exempt from this configuration. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: groups_invites_by
param.label: Invite By
param.description: Select how users may invite others to join groups.

param.name: groups_invites_create_limit
param.label: Create Limit
param.description: Input number of pending group invites each individual user is limited to creating per group. If blank allow unlimited invites. Moderators and group owners are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: groups_invites_resend
param.label: Resend Delay
param.description: Input the number of days between invite resending. Leave empty for no resending.

param.name: groups_invites_list
param.label: Connections
param.description: Enable or disable display of connections dropdown for quick inviting.

param.name: groups_invites_accept
param.label: Auto Accept
param.description: Enable or disable auto accept of group invites during registration.

param.name: groups_invites_captcha
